snippet: President Christian Wulff admitted in an interview that he had made a “grave mistake” in threatening a newspaper editor about a critical article.
abstract: German Pres Christian Wulff fights back against barrage of criticism over his handling of a private loan scandal, admitting he had made a 'grave mistake' in threatening a newspaper editor about a critical article, but insists he will not consider stepping down.
lead_paragraph: President Christian Wulff admitted in an interview that he had made a “grave mistake” in threatening a newspaper editor about a critical article.

headline.seo: German President Rejects Calls to Quit Over Loan Scandal
headline.main: German President Rejects Calls to Quit in Scandal
headline.print_headline: German President Rejects Calls to Quit in Scandal
